-  GET /v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipDefaultExperienceLocalizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipDefaultExperienceLocalizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClipDefaultExperiences-_id_-relationships-appClipDefaultExperienceLocalizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipDefaultExperienceLocalizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClipDefaultExperiences-_id_-relationships-appClipDefaultExperienceLocalizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClipDefaultExperiences-_id_-relationships-appClipDefaultExperienceLocalizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appClipDefaultExperiences-_id_-relationships-appClipDefaultExperienceLocalizations#response-codes)

[`Read Default App Clip Experience Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_)Get a specific default App Clip experience.[`Read the App Store Review Detail for a Default App Clip Experience`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-appclipappstorereviewdetail)Get App Store Review details for a specific default App Clip experience.[`GET /v1/appClipDefaultExperiences/{id}/relationships/appClipAppStoreReviewDetail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-relationships-appclipappstorereviewdetail)[`Read Localization Information for a Default App Clip Experience`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-appclipdefaultexperiencelocalizations)Get localized metadata that appears on the App Clip card for a specific default App Clip experience.[`Read App Store Version Information for a Default App Clip Experience`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-releasewithappstoreversion)Get App Store Version information for a default App Clip experience.[`Get the App Store Versions Resource ID for a Default App Clip Experience`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appclipdefaultexperiences-_id_-relationships-releasewithappstoreversion)Get IDs for App Store Versions related to a default App Clip experience.
